title: Money
content: - Money is a medium of exchange.

It is used to buy goods and services.

[Image Description in english only: A photo of various currencies from around the world, including coins and bills.]
narration: Money is something we use to buy things. It's like a special tool that lets us trade for what we need. Imagine you want to buy a delicious pizza. You can't just give the pizza maker your shoes! Instead, you use money to pay for it.
